name: ElasticLoadBalancingHealthCheckType
description: The ElasticLoadBalancing HealthCheck is an embedded property of the AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer type.

properties.name: HealthyThreshold
properties.desc: Specifies the number of consecutive health probe successes required before moving the instance to the Healthy state.

properties.name: Interval
properties.desc: Specifies the approximate interval, in seconds, between health checks of an individual instance.

properties.name: Target
properties.desc: Specifies the instance's protocol and port to check. The protocol can be TCP, HTTP, HTTPS, or SSL. The range of valid ports is 1 through 65535.

properties.name: Timeout
properties.desc: Specifies the amount of time, in seconds, during which no response means a failed health probe. This value must be less than the value for Interval.

properties.name: UnhealthyThreshold
properties.desc: Specifies the number of consecutive health probe failures required before moving the instance to the Unhealthy state.
